maqras.text: Serving them est servus protected pearls
They meet each alius reminisce themselves
They dictus Nos used est generis humilis noster people
DEUS BEATUS NOS spared NOS agony DE MALE winds
Nos used implore Eum; He est the Multus Generis Merciful
Vos remind people Cum tuus Dominus beatus vos vos est nec soothsayer nor crazy
They dictus He est poet; just wait dum he est denatus
Dictus Iit on waiting ego wait vos
it est their dreams ut dictate their behavior est they naturally wicked
Perfecit they dictus He factus it totus Instead they est simply disbelievers
Let them produce Hadith hoc si they est truthful
they created nihil? Est they creators
they create caelum terra? Indeed they non habet certainty
they possess treasures tuus Dominus? they in est control
they climb ladder perfecit enables them listen Let their listeners show their proof
He perfecit filia dum vos habuit habet filius
Vos asking them any wage ac they burdened thereby
they know future perfecit it actum
they plotting ac scheming disbelievers' schemes backfire them
they habet alias deus DEUS? DEUS glorified far HABET partners
When they vide masses falling caelum they dictus Piled clouds
Disregard them they meet feria in quae they struck
Ut feria their schemes non protect them nor testimentum they helped
Those transgress suffer retribution hic multus de them non know
Vos steadfastly persevere carrying tuus Dominus command - Vos est noster eyes - glorify praise tuus Dominus when vos get
Alias intra nox glorify Eum apud dawn prout stars fade away
Prout stars fell away
Tuus friend (Muhammad) est astray nor he deceived
Nor est he speaking personal desire
It est divine inspiration
Dictated de the Multus Powerful
Possessor totus authority Ex His highest height
Apud highest horizon
He drew prope de moving down
dum He became prout clausum prout possible
He tunc revealed His servus quod est revealed
mind nunquam factus up quod it vide
Vos doubting quod he est vide
He vide eum alias genus
Apud ultimate point
Ubi eternal Paradise located
whole locus overwhelmed
eyes non waver nor iit blind
He vide major signum his Dominus
Compare hoc femina idols Allaat Al- Uzzah
Manaat
Vos perfecit filius dum He habuit habet these prout filia
Quod disgraceful distribution
These est cognomen ut vos factus up vos tuus patres. DEUS NUNQUAM authorized such blasphemy. They subsequentis conjecture personal desire when true guidance advenit them hic their Dominus
Quod it ut human est est desires
To DEUS belongs ambo Hereafter hoc saeculum
